text: Bolyarovo () is a small town in Yambol Province, located not far from the border with Turkey. It is the administrative centre of the homonymous Bolyarovo Municipality. As of December 2009, the town has a population of 1,303 inhabitants. Bulgarian National Statistical Institute - towns in 2009 During the Ottoman rule it was called Paşaköy.http://www.fallingrain.com/world/BU/65/Bolyarovo.html ==References== Category:Towns in Bulgaria Category:Populated places in Yambol Province
title: Bolyarovo
